mapper.select: SELECT DISTINCT SUBSTR(OP_REPORT_ID, 1, 4) AS YEAR FROM T_OP_REPORTS ORDER BY OP_REPORT_ID DESC
SELECT TUI.USER_NAME, TCI.COMPANY_NAME FROM T_USER_INFO TUI LEFT JOIN T_COMPANY_INFO TCI ON TUI.COMPANY_ID = TCI.COMPANY_ID WHERE TUI.USER_CLASS = 'USER' AND TCI.COMPANY_ID = #{companyId}
SELECT COMPANY_NAME, (SELECT USER_NAME FROM T_USER_INFO WHERE USER_ID = MANAGER_ID) AS USER_NAME FROM T_COMPANY_INFO WHERE COMPANY_ID = #{companyId}

SELECT TTI.TITLE, TTI.REQUEST_TYPE_CD, (SELECT USER_NAME FROM T_USER_INFO WHERE USER_ID = MANAGER_ID) AS MANAGER_NM, TTI.CREATE_DT, TTI.EXPECTED_COMPLETE_DT, TTI.COMPLETE_DT, TTI.SUPPORT_CD, TTI.MD FROM T_OP_REPORTS TOR LEFT JOIN T_TICKET_INFO TTI ON TOR.COMPANY_ID = TTI.COMPANY_ID WHERE TOR.OP_REPORT_ID = 202407 AND TOR.COMPANY_ID = 1 AND TO_CHAR(TTI.CREATE_DT, 'YYYYMM') >= '202407' AND TO_CHAR(TTI.CREATE_DT, 'YYYYMM') < '202408'
